title: In Hong Kong, memories of China's Tiananmen Square massacre are being erased
content:
1. In Hong Kong, memories of China's Tiananmen Square massacre are being erased  CNN
  2. Police in Hong Kong warn against Tiananmen vigil  Al Jazeera English
  3. Police patrol Hong Kong park to enforce Tiananmen vigil ban  The Associated Press - en Español
  4. Tiananmen anniversary: US hails the ‘brave’ 33 years on as Hong Kong warns against gatherings  The Guardian
  5. Hong Kong Steps Up Memorial Bans for Tiananmen Square Massacre Anniversary  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 香港では、中国の天安門事件の記憶が消されつつある
在香港，对中国天安门广场大屠杀的记忆正在被抹去
